name.baseName: Lithium Hydroxide Production ; Battery Grade Lithium Hydroxide Monohydrate ; Causticization ; Lithium Carbonate Extracted from Concentrated Brine of Atacama Salt Lake, Chile
氢氧化锂生产 ; 电池级单水氢氧化锂 ; 苛化法 ; 智利阿塔卡马盐湖高浓卤水提取到的碳酸锂

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Lithium has historically been produced from subterranean brines in the Andean mountain region of Chile in the area known as the “Lithium Triangle,” which also includes parts of Bolivia and Argentina. There are also several other lithium-rich brine locations throughout the world, and each brine has a unique chemical composition, which necessitates different processes for isolating the desired end products (Wietelmann and Steinbild, 2014). This LCA considers the brines in the Atacama Desert of Chile, known as the Salar de Atacama. The brines are concentrated, processed into battery grade Li2CO3 and LiOH•H2O, and shipped worldwide for processing into battery cathode materials and, eventually, batteries.

历史上，锂一直产自智利安第斯山区的地下卤水，该地区被称为 "锂三角"，还包括玻利维亚和阿根廷的部分地区。全世界还有其他几个富含锂的卤水产地，每种卤水都有独特的化学成分，因此需要不同的工艺来分离出所需的最终产品（Wietelmann 和 Steinbild，2014 年）。本项生命周期评估考虑的是智利阿塔卡马沙漠中的卤水，即阿塔卡马盐湖。盐水经过浓缩，加工成电池级 Li2CO3 和 LiOH-H2O，然后运往世界各地加工成电池阴极材料，最终制成电池。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Li2CO3 is reacted in a series of stages with a mixture of CaO and water to produce LiOH•H2O. Again, since LiOH•H2O is the only product from the facility, process-level analysis is not needed; we analyzed data at the facility level and were able to determine the requisite energy and material inputs for LiOH•H2O production. Note that for the provided data there are two facilities at the same plant for Li2CO3 and LiOH•H2O production, respectively, but the facilities are separated, and the process data provided for each is unique. Using producer data, we determined the total facility-level material, energy, and water demand to produce LiOH•H2O. Emissions data provided were used to calculate non-combustion process emissions. The material and energy flows for LiOH•H2O production from lithium brine are summarized in Table 3. Water is consumed in this process. Again, since only LiOH•H2O is produced, there is no need to allocate to products.

Li2CO3 与 CaO 和水的混合物经过一系列反应生成 LiOH-H2O。同样，由于 LiOH-H2O 是该设备的唯一产品，因此不需要进行工艺层面的分析；我们分析了设备层面的数据，并确定了生产 LiOH-H2O 所需的能源和材料投入。请注意，就所提供的数据而言，同一工厂内有两套设施，分别用于生产 Li2CO3 和 LiOH-H2O，但这两套设施是分开的，为每套设施提供的工艺数据都是独一无二的。 利用生产商数据，我们确定了生产 LiOH-H2O 所需的设施级材料、能源和水的总需求。所提供的排放数据用于计算非燃烧过程的排放量。表 3 总结了利用锂盐水生产 LiOH-H2O 的物料流和能量流。在此过程中会消耗水。同样，由于只生产 LiOH-H2O，因此无需分配到产品中。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The battery-grade lithium hydroxide monohydrate produced via the causticization process is specifically used for the manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries. It is a critical component in the production of cathode materials for rechargeable batteries, which are commonly used in electric vehicles, portable electronics, and large-scale energy storage systems.
通过苛化法生产的电池级单水氢氧化锂专门用于锂离子电池的制造。它是可充电电池阴极材料生产中的关键组分，这些电池通常用于电动汽车、便携式电子设备和大规模能源储存系统。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When applying this LCA data set, users should consider the exclusion of production processes for raw materials and energy flows representing less than 1% of the total. It is important to ensure that these minor exclusions do not significantly impact the overall assessment conclusions. Additionally, practitioners should be aware of the technological applicability and regional specificity of data since it is derived from the Atacama Salt Lake, Chile, which may influence the environmental profile due to local conditions and technologies used.
在应用该生命周期评估数据集时，用户应考虑排除代表总数不到1%的原材料生产过程和能源流。重要的是确保这些小量排除不会对整体评估结论产生重大影响。此外，从业者应注意数据的技术适用性和区域特性，因为数据来源于智利阿塔卡马盐湖，由于当地条件和所使用的技术，这可能会影响环境概况。
